TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit ParserErrorCollection extends System.Collections.CollectionBase
Public NotInheritable Class ParserErrorCollection Inherits CollectionBase
public ref class ParserErrorCollection sealed : System::Collections::CollectionBase

summary.span: 管理分析过程中检测到的一组分析器错误。

span.span: Manages a set of parser errors detected during parsing.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供方法和属性可用于管理一系列对象。The class provides methods and properties that you can use to manage a collection of objects. 例如，可以将一组分析器错误添加到集合在分析时使用自定义时对象来报告的所有分析器在分析期间捕获的异常。For example, you can add a set of parser errors to a collection upon parsing while using a custom object to report all parse exceptions caught during parsing. 若要添加分析器错误以，删除它们，或在集合中找到它们，请使用以下命令：To add parser errors to, remove them from, or locate them in a collection, use the following: - 方法来添加单个到集合的对象。The method to add a single object to the collection. - 方法来添加多个到集合的对象。The methods to add multiple objects to the collection. - 这两个方法和属性，即索引器，以添加一个到集合中的指定索引处的对象。Both the method and the property, which is the indexer, to add a single object to the collection at the specified index. 此外，还可以使用类来执行以下操作：Additionally, you can use the class to do the following: - 删除对象与方法。Remove objects with the method. - 检查某个特定集合中，通过使用方法。Check whether a particular is in the collection by using the method. - 查找在何处对象存储在集合中使用方法。Find where a object is located in the collection by using the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the methods. [!code-csharp[System.Web.ParserErrorCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.ParserErrorCollection/CS/ParserErrorCollection_CS.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.ParserErrorCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.ParserErrorCollection/VB/ParserErrorCollection_VB.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法将添加一个现有到集合的对象。Use the method to add an existing object to the collection. 您不能添加相同不止一次对象复制到集合。You cannot add the same object to the collection more than once. 当您调用方法使用返回已在集合中，添加操作将失败，-1 的对象。When you call the method using a object that is already in the collection, the addition fails and -1 is returned. 若要将多个对象添加到集合中，使用方法。To add multiple objects to the collection, use the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何添加对象传递给对象。The following code example demonstrates how to add a object to a object. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您不能添加相同不止一次对象复制到集合。You cannot add the same object to the collection more than once. 但是，如果尝试添加对象一次以上不会引发异常。However, attempting to add a object more than once will not throw an exception. 相反，添加操作将失败。Instead, the addition will fail. 在这种情况下，方法将返回值 – 1。In this case, the method will return a value of –1. 但是，和方法没有返回值。However, the and methods do not have return values. 添加时通过使用下列方法之一的对象使用方法来确定某个特定对象已在集合中。When adding objects by using one of these methods, use the method to determine whether a particular object is already in the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何搜索指定的实例对象中对象。The following code example demonstrates how to search for an instance of a specified object in a object. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法复制对象集合 （包括它们所包含的项引用） 中添加到兼容的数组，指定索引处开始。Use the method to copy the objects in a collection (including the item references they contain) to a compatible array, starting at a specified index. 当你想要进行排序时，这是很有用通过使用集合中的对象方法。This is useful when you want to sort the objects in the collection by using the method. 具体方法为：To do this: 1. 复制到兼容的数组的对象。Copy the objects into a compatible array. 2. 对数组进行排序。Sort the array. 3. 使用方法来删除所有集合中的对象。Use the method to remove all the objects from the collection. 4. 使用方法排序的数组将重新添加到集合。Use the method to add the sorted array back to the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将复制的内容到指定的对象数组。The following code example demonstrates how to copy the contents of a object to the specified array.
